Together they stand, tall, dominating. Either of these two could take on most challengers as a team, together they just might be unstoppable....

You wanna know a bit more about the duo? want to or not, here's some history on these two as individuals

||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||


Rideout: Heavy set tiger : 14' tall, weighs roughly 4,000 lbs.


Well into his 'second life' as he would call it, Rideout spent the whole of his 'first life' as the muscle of a biker gang. He was well suited to the lifestyle: with his bulging biceps, tree trunk legs, and expansive beer gut he sure looked the part. Leather looked great on his stripey orange fur, and his brilliantly blue eyes flared with the passion he had for his lifestyle. Beating up deadbeats and assholes, and ridng off into the night on his extra large Harley, that's what life was really about. That was how things were all through his twenties, and he got a reputation for being the extra rough and rowdy sort of biker.... A decent guy some of the time, but willing and able to raise hell when the situation allowed for it. At one point, Rideout was considered the most likely to superceed the current gang leader.

However, Rideout gradually matured, he grew beyond the rolls his gang assigned to him. Late one night he did some soul searching, and after his 4th bottle of whisky decided that it was time for him to make money in slightly more savory ways. That night his entire gang somehow -disappeared- into thin air... as did Rideout for a week. Unlike the rest of his gang however, Rideout would re-appear with a new self image. Within two months he'd taken the wrestling world by storm. He was talented when it came to throwing his weight around, and years of 'setting examples' meant that the tiger also knew how to draw out a match for every bit of drama it was worth. It was assumed he'd be thrown into the 'bad-guy' wrestler archetype based on his background, but instead he became a sort of Neutral between good and evil. People think of him as a likeable sort of bad-ass, who looks good under the bright arena lights.

Sometimes he's known to swallow up an opponent after beating them, other times he might stuff them into the void between his other set of cheeks.... Either way, he's never as crass about it as one would think a Biker should be.

||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||


Brass: Musclebound giga-wolf : 14' tall, weight unknown


Brass had never wanted to be a wrestler. Instead, he'd started out as a normal sized boxer who was also obsessed with getting the biggest, firmist mucles ever known to the genre. He went through all the standards means of developing extra tone, such as working out and controled diet, and sure enough he got beefy. Yet he wasn't satisfied, instead he just desired for his body to become even more defined. Unwilling to use illegal drugs to obtain his means, he searched every possible legal way until he stumbled upon something that sounded promising. Testers were needed for trial of a new clinical treatment that could potentially increse a guy's muscle mass to 25% beyond normal limits. As if that deal weren't enticing enough, they paid all participants a small fee once they cleared the medical. As far as Brass could see, he had nothing to lose.

Sadly, there was more at stake then he thought. Results became noticable after the first week of testing: the lupine was clearly gaining extra definition in muscles all over his body (especially the glutes, oddly enough). Slowly they became more rounded and rippled, with the occasional vein now visible from beneath the fur.... however, early on in the fourth week a problem literally appeared over night. Brass went to bed a 6' tall wolf, and woke up the next morning a 14' tall titan. Also, his muscles had become rediculously large too, a normal fur could actually hide in the crevasses between his abs, chest, or, yes.... even his glutes. Now Brass was too tall and too massive to compete in normal boxing events, and there was no boxing league for wolves of his height. In fact, there were almost no career paths for an athlete at his size... accept for one. So it was by necessity, not want, that Brass looked into wrestling.

Turns out he was almost a natural at it. Sure he had to learn alot of new moves, and he needed to figure out how to work the crowd, but he's been happy with his new profession. Not as good as boxing, but he still gets to knock guys around, and sometimes he can even get a meal out of it.

15511.title: The Elephant kings. Toma and Joma

155112.content:
Candy and Cherry immediately ran to opposite sides of the ring, they nimbly jumped onto the ropes and ran towards their foes. Candy vaulted from her rope and before Toma could react she kicked him in the side of the head with both feet. This caused him to stumble into Joma where the both hit heads hard. This got some of the crowd laughing, seeing the two mighty elephants made to look like fools but a couple of human girls.
Candy and Cherry landed right next to each other on the spot they had been standing on when the match had started. "See I told you slow" Candy said. "But still oh so fat" Cherry said smiling.
Toma and Joma righted themselves and looked at the small human girls. "Time to put you two in your place" Toma said.
Candy and Cherry wasted no time in running back up onto the ropes, but this time Joma was ready for it. As Cherry was about to jump at him he flicked the rope up so that Cherry was sent flying high into the air and out of control. Because Toma was a bit dull Candy was successfully about to hit his face again but he was ready for the blow this time, as she was falling away from him he grabbed her ankle with his truck and slammed her down onto the mat. The force was so great that Candy bounced a couple of feet into the air before she landed again. Cherry landed next to Candy on the mat....
Toma and Joma advanced on the dazed girls. Rising their feet high ready to stomp the small girls....

155112.title: Two on Two all the time....
